revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=PLW1000 |revision=v1 |asin=B01B5CTRGE |fcc_date=08/31/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |availability=now |type=Powerline Access Point, extender |fcc_id=PY315200311 |ic_id=4054A-15200311 |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.3 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM47189A1;BCM47189A1KRFBG; |cpu1_cspeed=900 |cpu2_brand=Broadcom |cpu2_model=BCM60335;BCM60335KFSBG; |fla1=16 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CB64M16FP-DH |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM47189A1;BCM47189A1KRFBG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |flags=HomePlug AV2, SISO |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_user=admin |default_pass=password }} {{TagLine|PowerLine WiFi 1000 Access Point}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/powerline/PLW1000.aspx}} {{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=PLW1000}}
The device uses [[Broadcom]] BCM60335 as the HomePlug controller.
Default access: http://www.mywifiext.net
Sold in a kit consisting of: *One (1) PowerLine WiFi 1000 Access Point (PLW1000) *One (1) PowerLine 1000 Adapter (PL1000)
===See also=== *[[Netgear PL1000]] *[[Netgear PLP1000]] *[[Netgear PLW1000]]
